mapper.select: SELECT p.payment_number, p.payment_date, p.payment_title, p.payment_method, p.payment_agency, p.payment_price, p.payment_state, p.payment_nickname, p.member_email, p.lesson_number, l.lesson_thumbnail FROM payment p JOIN lesson l ON p.lesson_number = l.lesson_number WHERE p.payment_state = 1 AND p.member_email = #{email}
